From Wiki

Mysql: Countries

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `countries`;
CREATE TABLE `countries` (
	id INT AUTO_INCREMENT, 
  iso char(3) NOT NULL default '',
  name_tr varchar(100) default '',
  name_en varchar(100) default '',
  iso3 char(3) default '',
  numcode smallint(6) default '0',
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
) ENGINE=MyISAM;
